frame.name: Lively_place
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Location</fen> is characterized by a high amount of (often goal-oriented) <fen>Activity</fen>, or metonymically, with <fen>Individuals</fen> who are engaged in the activity.
<ex><fex name="Location">The park</fex> was <t>abuzz</t> <fex name="Individuals">with people</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Location</fen> where a lot of activity is taking place, or prototypically takes place.
</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation in amount of activity from the norm or from the amount for another <fen>Location</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Location</fen> is characterized by a lot of activity.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Location</fen> has some degree of activity or liveliness.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The larger or general area where the <fen>Location</fen> is lively.
<ex><fex name="pla">On this side of town</fex> the streets are <t>livelier</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Individuals
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Individuals</fen> are engaged in the <fen>Activity</fen>, creating a lively <fen>Location</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>Duration denotes the length of time from the beginning of a continuous situation (the one denoted by the target) to its end. In many cases, the continuous situation is a dynamic action which is ongoing, while in others it is simply an undifferentiated state.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The way in which the <fen>Individuals</fen> or <fen>Location</fen> is engaging in the <fen>Activity</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the Explanation causes the state of affairs expressed by the target, but not in all cases.</def-root>
